Uses of Interface
dist.hmm.StateDistribution

  • Packages that use StateDistribution 
    Package Description
    dist.hmm  

    • Uses of StateDistribution in dist.hmm

      Classes in dist.hmm that implement StateDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConditionalStateDistributionWrapper
      A wrapper class that turns a regular conditional distribution into a conditional state distribution (at some computational cost)
      class  SimpleStateDistribution
      A simple state functin doesn't look at the input observations at all when updating it's probabilities
      class  SimpleStateDistributionTable
      A look up table distribution for transitions

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get the initial state distribution
